title: The Maze Runner Series
description: The perfect gift for fans of "The Hunger Games" and " Divergent," this boxed set includes all of the paperback editions of James Dashner's" New York Times" bestselling series"--The Maze Runner," "The Scorch Trials," "The Death Cure" and "The Kill Order."When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his name. He's surrounded by strangers--boys whose memories are also gone. "Nice to meet ya, shank. Welcome to the Glade."  Outside the towering stone walls that surround the Glade is a limitless, ever-changing maze. It's the only way out--and no one's ever made it through alive. "Everything is going to change."  Then a girl arrives. The first girl ever. And the message she delivers is terrifying.  Remember. Survive. Run.
author: James Dashner
